about_the_game:
In this farming tycoon game, you will have to build and develop your base on the red planet and provide the Martian colony with supplies. Take up digging, building and mining to build your industrial empire there!

Adapt to surviving in extreme conditions, earn passive income and build your farming Empire on Mars! Become the first space millionaire!

Key Features

- Automate work at the farm by using robots, and earn income even when the game is off;
- Upgrade the greenhouses, Mars Rover and space base to improve business efficiency;
- Grow various crops and provide the inhabitants of the planet with the necessary supplies;
- Complete various tasks and get rewards;
- Invest wisely by making well-weighed business decisions;
- Make friends with an adorable dog named Cookie!
- Enjoy the incredible landscapes of Mars.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Idle Mars Colony is a simulator game of the clicker genre, where you can try your hand at being the owner of a space farm. It combines the best aspects of idle tycoon games and farming games. Earn money, automate the work and enjoy the exciting gameplay!
